Package net.happybrackets.core.scheduling

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Clock.ClockTickListener
    ClockTick interface for receiving clock Tick events
    Delay.DelayListener
    DelayReceived interface for receiving delay complee
    ScheduledEventListener
    Used for receiving scheduled events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AverageCalculator
    Enables a very efficient method for calculation accumulative averages by storing accumulated sum of all values and number of elements
    Clock
    Clock Class that uses HBScheduler
    Delay
    Delay Class that uses HBScheduler
    HBScheduler
    Stores events with the time they need to be executed and executes them when they are due
    ScheduledObject
    Comparator
